title: Thick and creamy seafood chowder
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '110g smoky bacon, rind removed and chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 small red chilli, seeded and minced', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '800ml fish stock', '4 large potatoes, finely diced', '350ml full fat milk', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '850g mixed white fish, bones and skins removed', '160ml double cream', '450g mixed shellfish, cooked']
